title: Understanding Relationships
text: A relationship in data analysis often involves connecting two data sources. Think about what they might have in common.

title: Common Elements
text: Consider what elements or features two data sources might share that would allow them to be connected.

hintAnswer: a field or column that two data sources have in common
title: Identifying the Common Field
text: What is the common element that allows two data sources to be related?
choices: a field or column that two data sources have in common
two tables that are both used for a single data visualization
two data sources that are related
